replies.body:
Gill youre still the only mczone /avicus player i remember lmao. Good to see you again man. Whatcha been up to?

Also if you remember the first mczone tournament, were you on the team with all the other staff members that was in the finals? If so, do you remember the team's name? I can't remember for shit all I know is that i played with team Nodus lmao.
replies.body_tagged:
Gill youre still the only mczone /avicus player i remember lmao. Good to see you again man. Whatcha been up to?

Also if you remember the first mczone tournament, were you on the team with all the other staff members that was in the finals? If so, do you remember the team's name? I can't remember for shit all I know is that i played with team Nodus lmao.

replies.body:
@Okiba Don't have opinions on current staff. Don't know all of them well enough. The ones I know are good though.

@FallingDamag I don't think I know you... So no opinion? The alphabet is pretty solid, but I think they should get rid of the "and" before Z. It always threw me off. Green and 19.

@BoldAndBrash The order should have happened after the first breach of internaitonal law. I fully support it and I hope we continue to help the Syrian people.

@Original Pretty solid, how is ebirdy9 doing? (P.S. Amazing name)

@Claf Damn, I recognize your name. You were one of those badass players that always destroyed me. I've been pretty good, just living life. How're you? Unfortunately, I was not on the team. I honestly can't think of the name, I'll try to find it. And didn't you guys win (I think pmheys was on the team??)
replies.body_tagged:
@Okiba Don't have opinions on current staff. Don't know all of them well enough. The ones I know are good though.

@FallingDamag I don't think I know you... So no opinion? The alphabet is pretty solid, but I think they should get rid of the "and" before Z. It always threw me off. Green and 19.

@BoldAndBrash The order should have happened after the first breach of internaitonal law. I fully support it and I hope we continue to help the Syrian people.

@Original Pretty solid, how is ebirdy9 doing? (P.S. Amazing name)

@Claf Damn, I recognize your name. You were one of those badass players that always destroyed me. I've been pretty good, just living life. How're you? Unfortunately, I was not on the team. I honestly can't think of the name, I'll try to find it. And didn't you guys win (I think pmheys was on the team??)

replies.body:
@Resepignev 
#Politics is a no brainer. EZ win for all (but the people who disagree with me, they're opinions will be shattered by facts)
Hahahahahahhahahahhahahahahahhaaha, I'd never be welcomed back, so no xD
Tinychat is a blessing for all of humanity, and the Admins should get drunk on it and have social events.
17 years = 17 years
